chapters.title: Chapter 5:  To Require a Boon
chapters.info: King Easar Togita, p. 157—King of Shienar. He has a compact frame, a square face, and white hair in a topknot. He is a head shorter than Paitar of Arafel. Sadness is a permanent presence in his eyes. His third son is married to Ethenielle's daughter. His wife died about eleven years ago.
